text: omal recessive inheritance - Elevated serum creatine phosphokinase - Fasciculations - Foot dorsiflexor weakness - Hyperhidrosis - Muscle cramps - Muscle stiffness - Myokymia - Myotonia - Progressive - Sensory axonal neuropathy - Skeletal muscle atrophy - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually list
